message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'd find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $110. This product is really worth it, and I'm confident you'd get a lot of value from it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet at $110. My maximum budget remains at $90.
